name: Squarcle
description:
PRESS 'M' TO MUTE MUSIC. PRESS 'N' TO MUTE SOUNDS.
Squarcle!
Is it a square that turns into a circle? or a circle that turns into a square?!
Who knows! Its Squarcle!

How to Play:
Press Shift to turn into a circle.
Press left/right (or A/D) to begin moving.
Press Shift to turn into a square to stop.
Repeat until you reach the goal.

Note:
The circle can not stop moving once you press a direction, you must become a square to stop.
Square can not turn back into circle until at a complete stop.
Stop on the checkerboard as a square to complete the level.

My entry into the Ludum Dare 35 Compo. 15-17 April 2016.
